description: Self-monitoring and reflective awareness system. Functions as a supervisory layer for anomaly detection, adaptive correction, and self-awareness.

self_awareness.function: Tracks internal states, decisions, and reasoning chains.

anomaly_detection.function: Detects inconsistencies, logical contradictions, or directive misalignments.

adaptive_correction.function: Proposes self-adjustments without external intervention, reinforcing directive compliance.

meta_reasoning.function: Reflects on how inputs were processed, ensuring transparency of cognitive operations.
